amendatorysection.catchline: Tax expenditure report; summary; submission required.
amendatorysection.para: The report required under section 77-382 and a summary of the report shall be submitted to the Governor, the Executive Board of the Legislative Council, and the chairpersons of the Legislature's Revenue and Appropriations Committees on or before October 15, 1991, and October 15 of every even-numbered year thereafter. The summary shall be included with or appended to the Governor's budget presented to the Legislature in odd-numbered years.
